name: tree-sitter-lux
description: Tree-sitter parser for the Lux programming language
author: Fabian Achammer <fabian.achammer@gmail.com> (https://github.com/fachammer)

scripts.unit-test: npm run build && npm run unit-test-only
scripts.example-test-only: find examples/lux/stdlib/source/ -name "*.lux" | (xargs -n 1 tree-sitter parse > syntax-trees.out || (grep "ERROR" syntax-trees.out && false))
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run unit-test-only && npm run example-test-only
scripts.package-test-only: cp -r test .test && cd .test && npm install tree-sitter ../tree-sitter-lux-$(node -e "console.log(require('../package.json').version)").tgz && node test.js
scripts.postpublish: cp -r test .test && cd .test && npm install tree-sitter tree-sitter-lux && node test.js
